caption.p:
Spatial and temporal variability of GDD 5 changes within the boreal region as described by selected 10-year period projections. Each map displays the difference between the respective five-year period average values (e.g. 2049 stands for the period 2045–2049). The values were obtained by averaging the emission CO 2 based projections for the seven GCMs. More detailed steps can be found in the Extended Data (Fig. 7). Map created using ArcGIS Desktop v. 10.4.1
65 .
